What does it do?

Flexible Content Element
Grid Element

Create shortcut content element for TV references
Before executing an action, make sure you create a full backup of your TYPO3 database!
TemplaVoila tools
TemplaVoila tools is a set of tools which can be helpfull when you want to migrate an existing TYPO3 website from TemplaVoila to Fluid / GridElements
Delete unreferenced elements
records has been marked as deleted.
Searches recursive on all pages for unreferenced elements and sets all found elements as deleted in the TYPO3 database.
Migrate TV FCE content to GridElement
Migrates the content from the selected FCE to the selected Grid Element and changed the content element type to Grid Element
Migrate content from TemplaVoila to Fluid

Migrate content from TemplaVoila content columns to Fluid backend layout columns. Use this module if you have several TemplaVoila content columns which do not have an oldStyleColumnNumber setting or if you want to rearrange content elements from TemplaVoila content columns to Fluid backend layout columns.
All TemplaVoila backend layout settings on pages will be replaced with the selected Fluid backend layout.

After content migration, you should not rearrage or create new content elements on pages with a Fluid Template, when TemplaVoila is still installed. TemplaVoila uses a method named correctSortingAndColposFieldsForPage, which moves all content elements to column 0.
content elements have been updated.
